an7.53:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahamoggallano dakkhinagirismim carikam caranti mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim.
an7.53:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena velukandaki nandamata upasika rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya parayanam sarena bhasati.
an7.53:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena vessavano maharaja uttaraya disaya dakkhinam disam gacchati kenacideva karaniyena.
an7.53:2.2: Assosi kho vessavano maharaja nandamataya upasikaya parayanam sarena bhasantiya, sutva kathapariyosanam agamayamano atthasi.
an7.53:3.1: Atha kho nandamata upasika parayanam sarena bhasitva tunhi ahosi.
an7.53:3.2: Atha kho vessavano maharaja nandamataya upasikaya kathapariyosanam viditva abbhanumodi:
an7.53:3.6: “Sadhu, bhadramukha, tena hi yo me ayam dhammapariyayo bhanito idam te hotu atitheyyan”ti.
an7.53:3.8: Sveva sariputtamoggallanappamukho bhikkhusangho akatapataraso velukandakam agamissati, tanca bhikkhusangham parivisitva mama dakkhinam adiseyyasi.
an7.53:4.1: Atha kho nandamata upasika tassa rattiya accayena sake nivesane panitam khadaniyam bhojaniyam patiyadapesi.
an7.53:4.2: Atha kho sariputtamoggallanappamukho bhikkhusangho akatapataraso yena velukandako tadavasari.
an7.53:4.3: Atha kho nandamata upasika annataram purisam amantesi:
an7.53:4.4: “ehi tvam, ambho purisa, aramam gantva bhikkhusanghassa kalam arocehi:
an7.53:4.5: ‘kalo, bhante, ayyaya nandamatuya nivesane nitthitam bhattan’”ti.
an7.53:4.6: “Evam, ayye”ti kho so puriso nandamataya upasikaya patissutva aramam gantva bhikkhusanghassa kalam arocesi:
an7.53:4.7: “kalo, bhante, ayyaya nandamatuya nivesane nitthitam bhattan”ti.
an7.53:4.8: Atha kho sariputtamoggallanappamukho bhikkhusangho pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena nandamataya upasikaya nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
an7.53:4.9: Atha kho nandamata upasika sariputtamoggallanappamukham bhikkhusangham panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi.
an7.53:5.1: Atha kho nandamata upasika ayasmantam sariputtam bhuttavim onitapattapanim ekamantam nisidi.
an7.53:5.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho nandamataram upasikam ayasma sariputto etadavoca:
an7.53:5.3: “ko pana te, nandamate, bhikkhusanghassa abbhagamanam arocesi”ti?
an7.53:6.1: “Idhaham, bhante, rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya parayanam sarena bhasitva tunhi ahosim.
an7.53:6.2: Atha kho, bhante, vessavano maharaja mama kathapariyosanam viditva abbhanumodi:
an7.53:6.6: ‘Sadhu, bhadramukha, tena hi yo me ayam dhammapariyayo bhanito idam te hotu atitheyyan’ti.
an7.53:6.8: Sveva sariputtamoggallanappamukho bhikkhusangho akatapataraso velukandakam agamissati, tanca bhikkhusangham parivisitva mama dakkhinam adiseyyasi.
an7.53:6.10: Yadidam, bhante, dane punnanca punnamahi ca tam vessavanassa maharajassa sukhaya hotu”ti.
an7.53:7.2: Yatra hi nama vessavanena maharajena evammahiddhikena evammahesakkhena devaputtena sammukha sallapissasi”ti.
an7.53:8.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:8.2: Atthi me annopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:8.3: Idha me, bhante, nando nama ekaputtako piyo manapo.
an7.53:8.4: Tam rajano kismincideva pakarane okassa pasayha jivita voropesum.
an7.53:8.5: Tasmim kho panaham, bhante, darake gahite va gayhamane va vadhe va vajjhamane va hate va hannamane va nabhijanami cittassa annathattan”ti.
an7.53:9.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:9.2: Atthi me annopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:9.3: Idha me, bhante, samiko kalankato annataram yakkhayonim upapanno.
an7.53:9.4: So me teneva purimena attabhavena uddassesi.
an7.53:9.5: Na kho panaham, bhante, abhijanami tatonidanam cittassa annathattan”ti.
an7.53:10.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:10.2: Atthi me annopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:10.3: Yatoham, bhante, samikassa daharasseva dahara anita nabhijanami samikam manasapi aticarita, kuto pana kayena”ti.
an7.53:11.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:11.2: Atthi me annopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:11.3: Yadaham, bhante, upasika patidesita nabhijanami kinci sikkhapadam sancicca vitikkamita”ti.
an7.53:12.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:12.2: Atthi me annopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:12.3: Idhaham, bhante, yavade akankhami vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
an7.53:12.4: Vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram vivekajam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
an7.53:12.5: Pitiya ca viraga upekkhika ca viharami sata ca sampajana sukhanca kayena patisamvedemi, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
an7.53:12.6: Sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharami”ti.
an7.53:13.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:13.2: Atthi me annopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:13.3: Yanimani, bhante, bhagavata desitani pancorambhagiyani samyojanani naham tesam kinci attani appahinam samanupassami”ti.
an7.53:14.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto nandamataram upasikam dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva utthayasana pakkamiti.
